arts.ttl: Atletico Madrid wins record 14th game in a row to lead Spanish league at halfway stage
arts.sum: Atletico Madrid set a club all-time record of 14 straight victories with a 1-0 win over Osasuna on Sunday and went top of the Spanish league at the halfway stage. Julián Álvarez scored in the 55th minute at the Metropolitano stadium to give Atletico the milestone victory and a one-point lead over second-place Real Madrid.

arts.ttl: Atlético Madrid set new all-time club record with win over Osasuna
arts.sum: Diego Simeone’s Atlético Madrid have on Sunday etched their names into the storied history books of the club. This comes owing to their latest three-point haul. Atlético marked their return…

arts.ttl: Atlético go top of LaLiga with win over Osasuna
arts.sum: Atletico Madrid claimed a 1-0 home win over Osasuna on Sunday to move top of the LaLiga standings thanks to a second-half goal from Julian Alvarez.

arts.ttl: Sunday's La Liga predictions including Atletico Madrid vs. Osasuna
arts.sum: Sports Mole provides score predictions and previews for all of today's La Liga fixtures, including Atletico Madrid vs. Osasuna.

arts.ttl: Diego Simeone reacts on how to compete with Real Madrid and Barcelona after controversial rulings
arts.sum: In a week in which FC Barcelona saw Dani Olmo registered despite failing to comply with financial fair play and Real Madrid ’s Vinícius Júnior given only a two-match ban for violent conduct, the final question of Diego Simeone’s press conference on Saturday was the most dramatic. Let’s hope that he continues to grow, let him grow, I don’t think it’s good to compare, the characteristics are different and hope that Koke continues to give us the time he is with us and Pablo gives us everything that we are looking forward to and that he himself imagines.”

arts.ttl: Sources: Barcelona and Atletico Madrid make contact over 'unbelievable' Manchester United player
arts.sum: TBR Football can exclusively confirm that Manchester United forward Marcus Rashford is the subject of interest from Barcelona and Atletico Madrid. Rashford’s future at Manchester...

arts.ttl: Weekend acca predictions: Five teams to back across Europe
arts.sum: It is set to be another busy week across the continent with action resuming in the Bundesliga and La Liga after the winter hiatus and Liam Flin has scanned the leagues to assemble a five-team acca for Saturday and Sunday.
